attributes.action: Get manufactures to apply stickers to toys, not parents as Christmas is coming.
attributes.additional_details: Evidence includes, dad/mum has messed up the stickers and put them on wrong way round or in the wrong place.
attributes.background: As Christmas fast approaches parents across the UK gear up for the onslaught that is sticking stickers to all the toys purchased. For as long as i can remember manufactures have unfairly handed this annoying responsibility over to us parents when we have enough to do on Christmas day as it is.

rejection.details: This would be a decision for manufacturers.
